item.description:
For $8, witness a raft of talented local performers the likes of which you have never seen at Providence’s premiere variety show! The Empire Revue brings you sketch comedy, improv, musical interludes, burlesque, magic, and general devilment, on the first Sunday of every month.

Featuring: sizzling music by Superchief Trio and your favorite funnybone fondlers, The Sparkling Beatniks: Richard Goulis, Hannah Devine, & Kate Lohman. Plus, special guest performers every month, unpredictable pre-show shenanigans, a talking squirrel and more!

 

I've been here once before and it is super fun. The show starts at 8:00 but people start lining up super early. Last time I had to sit on the floor because there were no seats left. I will be there for 7:00 just in case AS220 starts filling up fast. We can even grab a few drinks while we wait! :)
item.how_to_find_us: I will e-mail my phone number the day of the event. I will first be waiting outside of AS220 and make sure I wear a bright color so you can't miss me.
item.name: Empire Revue at AS220!
